name: HealthyHealth
slogan: HealthyHealth is building a new Standard for Life and Health Insurance Underwriting
description:
HealthyHealth is building a new Standard for Life and Health Insurance Underwriting.

We use digital data to calculate the risk of diagnosis for over 800 conditions, along with Extra Mortalities and Morbidities, saving applicants hours filling out long questionnaires or visiting the doctor.

Find out more via www.healthyhealth.com

team.title: Co Founder & COO
team.name: Etienne BOURDON
team.bioHtml: Experienced international e-commerce and Digital CEO CDO CMO co-founder of an InsurTech HealthTech startup with Family, Ultra Trail & kitesurfing activities.

jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.description:
We are looking for a Data Analyst with 2+ years of experience to join our team on a full time basis. The data analyst will be responsible for establishing data collection, data processes and implementing data quality processes that allow us to deliver to clients across the world.

Together with the Data Science team, you will collaborate with the Head of Design, the Tech Lead and our remote engineering team based in Ukraine. From design and delivery, you will work as a cross-functional team to shape our products, fast paced growing company and international infrastructure, currently in Asia, America, and Europe.
Tasks
• Identify important and interesting questions and translate those questions into concrete analytical tasks.
• Bring new data to answer client questions – collating and organising data from multiple sources
• Apply analytical techniques and tools to extract and present new insights to clients using reports and/or interactive dashboards
• Relay complex concepts and data into visualisations
• Collaborate with other team members (data scientists) to find the best solution for our products
• Design, build, test and maintain backend code (Establish data processes, define data quality criteria, Implement data quality processes)
• Take ownership of the codebase, suggest improvements, refactoring, etc.
• Be an active member of scrum team

Skills
• Python, or any other backend programming language (you must be willing to learn Python in such case)
• Data Analytics: 2 years (Required)
• Bachelor’s degree (or higher) in any quantitative field
• Good test-driven development habits
• Version control (ideally Git)
• Data visualisation

A plus
• An understanding of insurance and/or health analytics
• Keen interest in AI and machine learning
• Ability to work in Agile environment

Benefits
• Equity incentive
• Access to the Founders Factory network
• 20 days vacation
• Free coffee / Tea
• Shower and bike locker in the office
• Work with FTSE100 clients
• Multicultural team
• Central London location in a vibrant area (14 Dufferin Street, EC1Y 8PD -  Barbican, Moorgate,  Old Street stations)
• Salary based on experience

jobs.title: Account Manager
jobs.description:
Overview:

HealthyHealth is looking to kickstart its brand new Hong Kong Office with a Managing Director.

The role will have two primary short/medium term focus as well as one long term focus. In the short/medium term, the individual is required to manage a large scale project with an international client in Hong Kong and Korea, focusing on the delivery as well as the Client Relationship. 
Secondly, the individual will be required to develop business across the Region. This will be both cross-selling into existing clients, as well as finding new ones. 

In the long term, the individual will be required to build his/her team to grow the office as our business in Asia-Pacific grows.

The Individual will work closely with the companies Chief Executive, based in London who will be present for the first months after the office opening.

Detail:

Account & Project management:

Manage client engagement on the ground - meetings, workshops, presentations
Own client projects and run project streams
Deepen relationships: cross-sell, up-sell, new products and geographies
Customer success
Client insights, learnings 
Organisational mapping - key roles and decision-makers
Call reports
Servicing 
Revenue tracking and reporting

Business Development: 

Account planning, wallet sizing
Cross-sell, up-sell
New opportunities, find pain points 

Long Term:

Source and hire relevant employees
Manage Asia-Pacific Team

Benefits:

HK$500,000 annual salary + Bonus
Work from a central HK Office
Market-Standard Benefits
Yearly Team Holiday
Equity incentive
Access to the Founders Factory network
20 days vacation
Free coffee / Tea
Shower and bike locker in the office
Work with FTSE100 (and international equivalent) clients
Multicultural team

Must have’s:

5+ years of experience in Project Management
3+ years of Business Development experience
Visa-free travel to Seoul, Korea
Speaks Mandarin (& Cantonese)
Speaks English

Nice to have’s:

Visa-free travel to most Asia-Pacific countries
2+ years of Management Experience
Speaks Korean
